sn45.13:1.2: Then a mendicant went up to the Buddha … and asked him,
sn45.13:1.3: “Sir, they speak of this person called ‘a trainee’.
sn45.13:2.1: “Mendicant, it’s someone who has a trainee’s right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, and right immersion.
sn45.13:2.2: That’s how a trainee is defined.”
